duration.Description: Time from stimulus onset until response

block.Description: Each test scan consisted of 8 mini-blocks of 16 trials

trial.Description: Test block trial number out of 128 trials

task.Description: The type of task being conducted

disc.Description: The relative discriminability level of the task

mem_disc.LongName: Discriminability condition wrt the recognition memory task
mem_disc.Description: The relative discriminability level wrt the recognition memory regardless of task type

Levels.low: Low discriminability condition where studied images appeared once during the study phase
Levels.mod: Moderate discriminability condition where studied images appeared six times during the study phase

per_disc.LongName: Discriminability condition wrt the visual detection task
per_disc.Description: The relative discriminability level wrt the visual detection regardless of task type

Levels.low: Low discriminability condition where it was relatively difficult to find a person in the person-present images
Levels.mod: Moderate discriminability condition where it was relatively easy to find a person in the person-present images

trial_type.Description: The target status of each test image during a trial or miscellaneous event types

Levels.feedback: Feedback screen informing participants of the amount of money earned on a particular test mini-block
Levels.instructions: Instructions screen informing partcipants of the task conditions for the upcoming test mini-block

mem_type.LongName: The type of trial wrt the recognition memory task
mem_type.Description: The target status of each test image wrt the recognition memory task regardless of task type

Levels.nt: Nontarget item that did not appear during the study phase
Levels.tg: Target item that appeared during the study phase

per_type.LongName: The type of trial wrt the visual detection task
per_type.Description: The target status of each test image wrt the visual detection task regardless of task type

Levels.nt: Nontarget item that did not include a person in the image
Levels.tg: Target item that included a person in the image

left_option.Description: The response option that corresponds to a left hand button press

Levels.nt: Left hand button press corresponds to a nontarget response
Levels.tg: Left hand button press corresponds to a target response

resp_hand.Description: The hand used to make a response

response.Description: The response reported by the participant

pay.Description: Money earned or lost on each trial in dollars

pay_tot.Description: Running total of bonus payment in dollars within a test block
